socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: qualitative description of disease burden and healthcare utilization
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: PMM2-CDG - NORD

socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: qualitative assessment of quality of life impact (PROMs)
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Patient reported outcomes for phosphomannomutase 2 congenital disorder of glycosylation (PMM2-CDG): listening to what matters for the patients and health professionals

justification: Only qualitative descriptions of severe burden were found, including reports on mortality risk, quality of life impact, and supportive care needs, but no quantitative cost-of-illness data specific to PMM2-CDG.
